metadata.title: CVE-2021-46049 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A Pointer Dereference Vulnerability exists in GPAC 1.0.1 via thegf_fileio_check function, which could cause a Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
